entry.title: Octopress challange: Code snippets
entry.content:

entry.title: Octopress challange: Hello world
entry.content: I’ve made it! Finally the blog is up and running. I’m going to take a bit of time to put here some ideas and discoveries I dig as a software developer. Probably Java stuff. Maybe a little about events on my personal life. So far I have to get into Octopress and Ruby to smarten things up. Wish me luck. Till next time.
